授業目的: The course will be a basic introduction into the theory and practice of international relations. Students will learn concepts, definitions and dimensions of international relations studies and acquire analytical skills to navigate today's world's complex international relations.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: This course will conducted as a mix of lecture and interaction (seminar/discussion) format. Typically, the topics of each session will be introduced in lecture format (30-40 minutes) and further developed through Q&A/discussions and group work by the students.
